description.introduction: Hi I'm Jan and I'm a software developer based in Warendorf, Germany. I develop applications for all platforms but I prefer the web. When working on a project I focus completely on the product. Therefore I put emphasis on a good design, software architecture and on the code itself to achieve an optimal result.
description.main: 2018 I completed my Bachelor's degree at the Rhine-Waal University of Applied Sciences. While and after studying I worked at the DÃ¼sseldorf based company Cognigy which develops a conversational automation platform. At the moment I'm working at the software provider Arvato in the e-commerce section.
description.additional-information: Beside developing software I love sport - whether it's running, fitness or bouldering.
